## ComponentEffectsSubscriber class

Responsible for injecting effects (see [Effect](./state-management.effect.md)<!-- -->) within its provider scope Effects are handled be subscribing and dispatching the returning actions to the store.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ComponentEffectsSubscriber extends EffectsSubscriberBase 
```
<b>Extends:</b> EffectsSubscriberBase
